item.title: By: Jan-Piet Mens
item.dc:creator: Jan-Piet Mens
item.description: <p>Matt, it was good meeting you and sharing some of the free IBM beer. If we hadn't been standing where we were, we'd have died of hunger... <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif"</a> /></p>
item.content:encoded: Matt, it was good meeting you and sharing some of the free IBM beer. If we hadn’t been standing where we were, we’d have died of hunger… http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif“ />

item.title: By: Eileen Fitzgerald
item.dc:creator: Eileen Fitzgerald
item.description: <p>Matt, you were a star and are now part of the event gang, you are gettin your own t-shirt next year, 'The Roadie'. Thank you so much for your assistance in setting up and pulling down the gear and becoming the gofor guy. Your assistance was invaluable and very very much appreciated. </p>
item.content:encoded: Matt, you were a star and are now part of the event gang, you are gettin your own t-shirt next year, ‘The Roadie’. Thank you so much for your assistance in setting up and pulling down the gear and becoming the gofor guy. Your assistance was invaluable and very very much appreciated.

item.title: By: Kevin Pettitt
item.dc:creator: Kevin Pettitt
item.description: <p>Great to see you mate, and thanks for helping to make this week a success on so many levels, both for me personally and for the show as a whole.<br /><br />You missed the Karaoke (or at least most of it) at the Geek Dinner. I haven't laughed that hard in a LONG time. And you missed me getting dragged up to sing (thanks Mr. Lepofsky!). On second thought, maybe it was good you missed that <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif"</a> />.</p>
item.content:encoded:
Great to see you mate, and thanks for helping to make this week a success on so many levels, both for me personally and for the show as a whole.

You missed the Karaoke (or at least most of it) at the Geek Dinner. I haven’t laughed that hard in a LONG time. And you missed me getting dragged up to sing (thanks Mr. Lepofsky!). On second thought, maybe it was good you missed that http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif“ />.
